column4: does anyone know a good webpage editor like dreamweaver in linux?
also....
when i tried to run freshclam, it says that my clamav is out of date...
but when i do apt-get update on my clamav.... i can't get newer version...
what should i do?
Two choices. Convince someone to package clamav 0.80 for Ubuntu, or ignore it :)
coz i cant update the virus database unless i get newer version of clamav
It *does* update, it just can't use all of the functionality
WARNING: Your ClamAV installation is OUTDATED - please update immediately !
WARNING: Current functionality level = 2, required = 3
Database updated (26112 signatures) from database.clamav.net (218.44.253.75).
ERROR: Clamd was NOT notified: Can't find or parse configuration file /etc/clamav/clamav.conf
ooo
sorry2
That's a successful database update. Are you running clamd?
i think so...
Then you should have /etc/clamav/clamav.conf ...
err no
i did not run it
how to run it? i don't have it.. should i download it?
If you want to run clamav as a daemon, install clamav-daemon :)
